website_summaries.verdict: For those in need of a little something extra to combat bad breath, this antibacterial tongue spray and scraper combo is ideal.
pros: Antibacterial spray is specially formulated to kill odor-causing bacteria and loosen build up
Only requires a single spritz per use
Comes with two flexible tongue scrapers to remove debris
Actively fights bad breath while cleaning
cons: Some users felt the tongue scraper wasn't very effective

customer_reviews.title: Description of Product was Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Received product but did not use after thoroughly reading the ingredients and read if this product was swallowed by accident I would have to call Poison Controll immediately. Product also has PEG 40 which I overlooked in the description. If the description on the website stated I needed to call Poison Control Center then I would not have purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lenci

customer_reviews.title: Ouchy
customer_reviews.text: The spray is just basically mouth wash. The tongue scraper is too harsh and rigid. I've used others in the past but this one rips my taste buds right off and then I have a slightly swollen sore tongue. If you're going to try the tongue scraping for the first time, buy something much less rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Usnotthem

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. I read a review that stated it’s the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I read a review that stated it’s the same as listerine and I almost didn’t purchase. It does taste like listerine but other than that there isn’t a comparison. This product loosens up the bacteria that makes your tongue white. The scrappers are good quality. I had a plastic one before but this does a waaaaay better job...I thought all plastic tongue scrappers were the same. This product will build your confidence and keep your tongue pink!!
customer_reviews.author: Dcross

customer_reviews.title: I don't find this to be any better than listerine
customer_reviews.text: I don't find this to be any better than listerine. The tongue scraping is really the key. Will not repurchase. There is better stuff out there. Tongue Gel works to clean tongue very well, I also use Therabreath. Breath Appeal is pretty good too. Clean fresh breath is a priority for me since I talk up close to people at work. Nobody wants to smell dragon breath.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tongue scraper. Note that there is a “smooth” and “rough” side. The rough is good for a deep but still gentle clean. The spray has a minty taste. Not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this would make such a difference but it absolutely does! You may think your mouth is clean just by running your toothbrush over your tongue but you’re wrong. The scraper is perfect, not to soft or sharp - it gets so much out of your mouth that it’s unreal. The spray helps with the process and doesn’t taste bad either - great product
customer_reviews.author: TerriL1125

customer_reviews.title: if your breathe smells like poo, this spray is for you
customer_reviews.text: if your breathe smells like poo, this spray is for you! It takes 3 days for your breath to smell like roses :) worth it's weight in gold, there is no better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t taste horrible but isn’t great, only need two sprays and the tool works good doesn’t hurt and gentle enough to clean. I would but it again even though I dont like the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for several years after battling bad breath, and it has worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me the confidence of clean, fresh breathe. I have used it for several years after battling bad breath, and it has worked for me. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bboop

customer_reviews.title: It works but just OK.
customer_reviews.text: This is just OK. Spray can get kind of messy. However, I do like the taste and it is refreshing. I think I should have gotten the mouthwash instead.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy rolling

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product, it even came with scrappers so I wouldn’t have to buy extra ones. The spray really helped with the bacteria that I had in the back of my tongue after days of not cleaning out, the scrappers really get the job done, not like a toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: esteban

customer_reviews.title: Fairly effective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it, using it every night and morning after brushing and it does eliminate the bacteria on tongue, I used to use oral b foam which was effective too, but it's been discontinued, and I find this product the best overall compared to the gel out there.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!

customer_reviews.title: No more morning breath.

customer_reviews.text: The picture displays two tongue scrapers along with the solution. In the actual delivery I only got the solution. Where are the tongue scrapers? The package does not contain the tongue scrapers. Does it not come with. It's supposed to be a kit. How can it be called a kit without the tongue scrapers? They should be included.

customer_reviews.title: So many people here write useless reviews and don't know what they are talking about ...
customer_reviews.text: So many people here write useless reviews and don't know what they are talking about "it didn't work", well what did you expect?! I'll keep it short. This item has Cetylpyridinium Chloride which is anti-fungal/yeast, think candida. Study has shown that it can inhibit candida (oral thrush). There is also nice essential oils in it and has a minty cool feeling as well. I've been very satisfied with this product and would highly recommend it for a good dental hygiene routine.

customer_reviews.text: I love it, come with 2 scrappers. one for my husband and I. It scrapes all the nasty stuff on your tongue that you cant brush off with a tooth brush
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: The spray made my teeth very sensitive it hurt to ...
customer_reviews.text: The spray made my teeth very sensitive it hurt to chew. It went away when I stopped using the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had a BreathRx tongue scraper that I received from a dentist about 13 yrs ago; the blue plastic one. I used it every day. If I didn't, I felt like I didn't brush my teeth. Well, it finally broke in half. I was pleased to find that the BreathRx brand is available. The blue scraper has one side with smaller teeth for a soft scrape, and one side with larger teeth for a deeper scrape. If you've never used a tongue scraper, I highly recommend that you do. It gets all the crud off your tongue and makes your mouth feel so clean and refreshed...even more so if you the mouth spray with it. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: Breath Fanatic
customer_reviews.text: If you're always worried about your breath like I am, this is a great product. I bought one for work, for home, and for my son. I have a tendency to overdo it a little on the scraper (and I doubt that helps, it's probably not good for my tongue to make it bleed), but my mouth always feels much fresher and cleaner after using the scraper and breath spray.
customer_reviews.author: Curlyconch

customer_reviews.title: I didn't find that the scrapper worked well for either use BUT the antibacterial spray is amazing! It doesn't mask odor but kills odor
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for the tongue scraper. I have a friend that got one from her dentist and she uses it for blackhead removal only! Not as a tongue scrapper. I didn't find that the scrapper worked well for either use BUT the antibacterial spray is amazing! It doesn't mask odor but kills odor. Perfect for work, travel or your purse. I use it daily after lunch and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kama

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best product out there to get rid of bad breath
customer_reviews.text: I have used Breath RX daily tongue care for over 10 years; it was first recommended by my dentist. It is absolutely the best product out there - on a whole different level than mouthwashes or products to fight bad breath that you buy in the store. It works!!! I start every day with it. Please don’t ever stop making it!

product_meta.title: BreathRx Daily Tongue Care Kit. America's #1 Dentist Dispensed Breath Care System, 2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionFormerly only available through a dental office, the Anti-Bacterial Tongue Spray contains Zytex, a special complex of zinc, thymol and eucalyptus oil, clinically proven to kill odor-causing bacteria and break up foul-smelling odors. Its companion, the Gentle Tongue Scraper, can dramatically reduce bad breath with just one scrape. The Anti-Bacterial Tongue Spray loosens and kills odor-causing bacteria while the Gentle Tongue Scraper lifts debris to the surface of the tongue and sweeps it out of the mouth. Now your mouth has that fresh clean feeling!
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars443 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
